author: puigh
body: Pull request to remove FourVectorHLTOffline, FourVectorHLTriggerOffline, and BTagHLTOffline from DQMOffline and HLTriggerOffline. These packages are not thread safe, and they are not being used by any groups.
title: Remove FourVectorHLT and BTagHLTOffline from DQMOffline and HLTriggerOffline
